title: Chocolate surprise fairy cakes
ingredients: ['375g plain flour', '375g caster sugar', '50g best quality cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '160ml vegetable oil', '500ml water', '2 tablespoons vinegar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 (200g) tub cream cheese, softened', '1 egg', '75g caster sugar', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '170g chocolate chips']
